SEARCH
Package domain

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
domain.UserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject
public class UserController extends Object implements Subject
Controller class for managing user-related operations in the system. This class serves as the main interface between the presentation layer and the data access layer for all user management functionality.

    • UserController

      public UserController()
      Constructs a new UserController with default dependencies. Initializes the UserDaoJpa implementation and adds a default NotificationObserver.

      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address
      password - The user's password
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If authentication fails due to invalid credentials

    • createUser

      public UserDTO createUser(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber, LocalDate birthdate, String street, String houseNumber, String postalCode, String city, Role role) throws IllegalArgumentException, NumberFormatException
      Creates a new user with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The user's first name
      lastName - The user's last name
      email - The user's email address
      phoneNumber - The user's phone number
      birthdate - The user's birthdate
      street - The street name of the user's address
      houseNumber - The house number of the user's address
      postalCode - The postal code of the user's address
      city - The city of the user's address
      role - The user's role
      Returns:
      The created user as a UserDTO

    • updateUser

      public UserDTO updateUser(int userId, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber, LocalDate birthdate, String street, String houseNumber, String postalCode, String city, Role role, Status status) throws IllegalArgumentException, NumberFormatException
      Updates an existing user with the provided information.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to update
      firstName - The updated first name
      lastName - The updated last name
      email - The updated email address
      phoneNumber - The updated phone number
      birthdate - The updated birthdate
      street - The updated street name
      houseNumber - The updated house number
      postalCode - The updated postal code
      city - The updated city
      role - The updated role
      status - The updated status
      Returns:
      The updated user as a UserDTO

    • generatePassword

      private static String generatePassword()
      Generates a secure random password with a mix of character types. The password will contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character. The total length of the password will be between 10 and 20 characters (inclusive). The password is generated using cryptographically secure random numbers and includes characters from the following categories: - Lowercase letters (a-z) - Uppercase letters (A-Z) - Digits (0-9) - Special characters (!@#$%^invalid input: '&'*()-_=+[]{}|;:'",.invalid input: '<'>/?)
      Returns:
      A randomly generated secure password as a String
      See Also:
      • SecureRandom

    • getFilteredUsers

      public List<UserDTO> getFilteredUsers(String searchFilter, String selectedStatus, String selectedRole)
      Retrieves users filtered by search criteria, status, and role.
      Parameters:
      searchFilter - The string to filter user names (case insensitive)
      selectedStatus - The status to filter by (null for no status filter)
      selectedRole - The role to filter by (null for no role filter)
      Returns:
      List of UserDTO objects matching the filter criteria
